title: Que dodge timers are rediculous
body: Granted, it's to keep the trolls at bay, but seriously? 30 min for only dodging twice? first time i dodge was because a player repetedly spammed racial slurs and cursed everyone out for no reason at all, and the second was because someone picked Teemo jungle...i believe those are 2 very valid reasons to que dodge

replies.body: It's very disheartening to lose a series because you lose track of time during such a short timer...
I've lost two series' because of doing research and time running out. It would be great if it picked the champ you pre-approved automatically....
Why can't it just auto pick the champ you have chosen????

Didn't want to start a new topic, but JUST had this happen to me too.
Could have sworn (wiki even says...) that first dodge is 5 mins, second is 15.
I dodged once intentionally (team comp looked really weak) and a second time by mistake (just stupid on my part...) 

But I almost NEVER dodge.  Probably should dodge MORE bad comps, honestly... 
But my timer went straight to 30 mins.  Seems a little excessive.

Apparently the lock out for featured game mode dodges is TWO HOURS. xD
Glad it wasn't one of those...

But still, has it been changed ?  Is it just 30 mins for two dodges now?  Seems a little nuts.

I agree 100%. You go into a game, call a position and then you get the trolls that refuse to have any respect and then just say they are taking the spot and subsequently ruin the game because they don't want to be part of the team. The players that don't act like jerks get punished because we don't want a busted game. I can understand starting at 2 min, then 4 then 8 for multiple dodges, but the times should be far more reasonable. You can't just look at it as everyone that dodges is because they are the problem. I called support first twice in a row and then was told to f off, because they were a duo. That's not how the unwritten rules go. In regs you call your spot, first come first serve. You then ask if they would be willing to switch. Draft picks are worse because you spend 5 minutes banning champs and then someone leaves because they don't get what they want. Please think about the times and make them more realistic. Not 5 min then 15 then 30 that is just stupid
Teemo jungle is more valid than a first-time riven top.
...im in bronze...i highly doubt the player had the skill to pull it off

Exactly. In bronze, anything can be played anywhere and it will possibly work, because there is no teamwork, warding, organization or knowledge of kits, strategy or common sense.

I have seen stuff as weird as support garen, jungle veigar and top soraka carry games as often as i see highly meta "OP" picks feed spectacularly.
